title: Calculate Asset Depreciation
description: A business needs to calculate the annual depreciation expense for a vehicle it purchased during the year.

tasks.description: Gather the vehicle's cost basis, date placed in service, and percentage of business use.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary information for the calculation.

tasks.description: Determine the correct depreciation method and recovery period under MACRS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the asset class and depreciation schedule.

tasks.description: Calculate the annual depreciation deduction using Form 4562.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the allowable depreciation for the year.
